article_title: Israel back in Eurovision 2024 after lyric change
sentence: Its  military  launched  an  air  and  ground  campaign  in  Gaza  after  Hamas's  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  around  1,200  people  were  killed  and  253  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel back in Eurovision 2024 after lyric change
sentence: More  than  30,800  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
